ValidationRule.description: We prevent user to go to”En attente de financement et “ En attente de document“ stage if plan Trevi not attached
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISCHANGED(Status), NOT( OR( ISPICKVAL(ContractType__c , '39'), ISPICKVAL(ContractType__c , '40'), ISPICKVAL(ContractType__c , '41'), ISPICKVAL(ContractType__c , '42'), ISPICKVAL(ContractType__c , '43'), ISPICKVAL(ContractType__c , '44'), ISPICKVAL(ContractType__c , '45'), ISPICKVAL(ContractType__c , '46'), ISPICKVAL(ContractType__c , '47'), ISPICKVAL(ContractType__c , '48'), ISPICKVAL(ContractType__c , '49'), ISPICKVAL(ContractType__c , '50'), ISPICKVAL(ContractType__c , '51'), ISPICKVAL(ContractType__c , '52') ) ), NOT( Plan_Trevi_Attached_tech__c ), OR( ISPICKVAL(Status , 'Awaiting documents'), ISPICKVAL(Status , 'Awaiting financing') ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The Order status cannot be Awaiting documents or Awaiting financing because the plan Trévi is not attached.
